name: @wcpos/woocommerce-pos
description: A simple front-end for taking WooCommerce orders at the Point of Sale.

scripts.pretest: wp-env start --xdebug=coverage && wp-env run cli --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/woocommerce-pos' composer install
scripts.test:unit:php: wp-env run cli -- wp plugin activate woocommerce && wp-env run --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/woocommerce-pos' tests-cli -- vendor/bin/phpunit -c .phpunit.xml.dist --verbose --log-junit phpunit.xml

author: kilbot
